meanings.definition: To remove ice or frost from something.
meanings.sent1: I need to deice the car windows before driving.
meanings.sent2: The airport crew will deice the plane before takeoff.
meanings.sent3: Trying to deice a frozen lock can be quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her warm smile seemed to deice the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: Using a hairdryer can quickly deice a frozen pipe.

meanings.definition: To prevent ice from forming on something.
meanings.sent1: The special spray helps deice the windshield in winter.
meanings.sent2: Pilots deice the wings of the aircraft to ensure safe flying.
meanings.sent3: She always carries a deicing solution in her car during snowy days.
meanings.sent4: His jokes never fail to deice a frosty atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: Adding salt to the roads can effectively deice them in cold weather.
